title: An Italian politician did not expose her underwear during her swearing-in ceremony
subtitle: The original photo has been edited to show this.
author: fullfact.org
vclaim:
An Italian politician did not expose her underwear during her swearing-in ceremony

A photo apparently showing Italian politician Maria Elena Boschi exposing her underwear has been shared thousands of times on Facebook. 

 

 However, the photo has been edited. The original photo is of Ms Boschi being sworn into government in 2014 and does not show her exposing her underwear. 

 

 The edited photo has been in circulation for a number of years and has also been widely debunked.

This article is part of our work fact checking potentially false pictures, videos and stories on Facebook. You can read more about this—and find out how to report Facebook content—here. For the purposes of that scheme, we’ve rated this claim as false as the photo has been edited.
